wumpus.description: A snuggly wuggly wumpus wants to eat you so hard right now.
wumpus.dead: The wumpus lies dead, and will munchus on lunchus made from your haunchus no more.

kitty witty.description: An adowabew wittwe kitty witty wants to eat you so hawd wight now.
kitty witty.dead: The dead carcass of an adowabew wittwe kitty witty wies off to the side, what a tewibew sight.

Chthulhu.description: The Ancient One, gargantuan and indescribably horrible, glides silently about on ten thousand tenticles.
Chthulhu.dead: The hulking mass of Chthulhu dominates the background of the landscape, surrounded by chanting occultists and hysterically screaming nether-witches. It's pretty sweet.

exploding barrel.description: An exploding barrel, red with a yellow explody symbol on it, skips to and fro whistling an 'appy tune.
exploding barrel.dead: A black crater is all that remains of the once-joyful exploding barrel
